subject: Football
Coaches and Managers
lead_paragraph: The Giants are 6-2 and would seem to be in good shape at the midway point of the regular season, but since 2004, the team has had a losing second-half record.
snippet: The Giants are 6-2 and would seem to be in good shape at the midway point of the regular season, but since 2004, the team has had a losing second-half record.
